name: Phyzard
description:
The concept for Philbert The Phyzard (Physics Wizard) is not a planned out idea, we had a burst of inspiration after using a random game idea generator and just started making something. We are very much open to ideas and criticism so please feel free to give either. 

The initial idea generated by Orteils was 'An experimental game where you gravitate around the laws of physics with a magic wand'.

The current thought is to make a puzzle game using magic spells that create different physics based spells, the current spells are a 'Push' and 'Pull' that are able to affect rigid bodied cubes referred to as physics props or boxes, each box has a weight attached to it. There is also a pressure plate that has a weight needed to activate so you have to move the boxes onto it until the weight is equal to or over the needed value, this will then activate a portal that will take you to the next level.
